alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Blair (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 20 at 9:36PM EST until November 21 at 1:00PM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 1 PM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch on the highest elevations, little to no ice in the valleys. Snow and sleet accumulations less than an inch. * WHERE...Blair and Bedford Counties. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 1 PM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions, and some icy sidewalks and driveways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The coldest road surfaces and greatest potential of slippery roads will be on the ridgetops. The precipitation will turn to rain as the morning continues, but could last as freezing rain on the ridges until mid-day.
info.instruction: The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania roadways. Call 5 1 1 or visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway and traffic conditions. To report snow or ice, post to the NWS State College Facebook page, use Twitter @NWSStateCollege, or visit weather.gov/ctp.
